titleStmt.title: Proposals humbly offer'd to the consideration of this present Parliament Being a soft and easie way for the raising of money, in order to the perpetual maintaining and defending of this kingdom. Licensed, and entered according to order, 1689.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for W. Pardoe, in Westminster,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
